specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Agencies included have total annual R&D obligations of $100 million or more. All other agencies include Department of Housing and Urban Development, Department of Labor, Department of State, Department of the Treasury, Appalachian Regional Commission, Consumer Product Safety Commission, Federal Communications Commission, Federal Trade Commission, Library of Congress, National Archives and Records Administration, Nuclear Regulatory Commission, Tennessee Valley Authority, and U.S. Postal Service.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Science Foundation, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development, FYs 2018–19 (Volume 68).Science and Engineering Indicators
